name: appauthhelper
description: Wrapper for AppAuthJS to assist with silent token acquisition and renewal

scripts.build-appAuthHelper: browserify --s AppAuthHelper -o appAuthHelperBundle.js appAuthHelper$SUFFIX.js && babel --out-file appAuthHelperBundle.js appAuthHelperBundle.js
scripts.build-appAuthHelperFetchTokens: browserify -o appAuthHelperFetchTokensBundle.js appAuthHelperFetchTokens$SUFFIX.js && babel --out-file appAuthHelperFetchTokensBundle.js appAuthHelperFetchTokensBundle.js
scripts.build-appAuthServiceWorker: browserify -o appAuthServiceWorker.js appAuthServiceWorkerCore.js && babel --out-file appAuthServiceWorker.js appAuthServiceWorker.js
scripts.build: npm run build-appAuthHelper && npm run build-appAuthHelperFetchTokens && npm run build-appAuthServiceWorker

author: Jake Feasel
